content.question: In line 4, Harpalyce volucremque fuga praevertitur Hebrum is translated

choices.label: and swift Harpalyce, fleeing, outruns the Hebrus
and the Hebrus outruns swift Harpalyce in flight
and Harpalyce outruns the swift Hebrus in flight
and the swift Hebrus outruns the fleeing Harpalyce

content.answer: and Harpalyce outruns the swift Hebrus in flight

unit.text: 4: Teacher's Choice - Latin Poetry and Vergil's Aeneid, Excerpts from Books 1 and 2
